u-sider-modal/position.description: The location where the sidebar pop-up window stops (currently only supports the left and right sides)

u-sider-modal/toggleShow.description: Whether to display the sidebar pop-up window

u-sider-modal/buttonText.description: Display text of pop-up window expand/collapse button

u-sider-modal/positionY.description: The position of the Y-axis of the sidebar pop-up window
